Literature.Title: Identification of an Anti-MRSA Cyclic Lipodepsipeptide, WBP-29479A1, by Genome Mining of Lysobacter antibioticus
Literature.Author: Sang M, Wang H, Shen Y, Rodrigues de Almeida N, Conda-Sheridan M, Li S, Li Y, Du L

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:50% Cytotoxicity=>32 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=>32 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300 LAC(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis 1457(MIC=<=0.25µg/ml),Escherichia coli K-12(MIC=>32µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>32µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=>32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=<=0.25µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=>32µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC 208821(MIC=>32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>32µg/ml)
